name: linux_browser_extensions
pattern: {"platform": "linux", "description": "ATT&CK: T1176", "queries": {"chrome_extensions": {"query": "SELECT u.username, ce.* FROM users u CROSS JOIN chrome_extensions ce USING (uid);", "interval": 3600, "description": "Lists all chrome extensions - ATT&CK T1176"}, "opera_extensions": {"query": "SELECT u.username, ce.* FROM users u CROSS JOIN opera_extensions ce USING (uid);", "interval": 3600, "description": "Lists all Opera extensions - ATT&CK T1176"}, "firefox_addons": {"query": "SELECT u.username, ce.* FROM users u CROSS JOIN firefox_addons ce USING (uid);", "interval": 3600, "description": "Lists all Firefox addons - ATT&CK T1176"}}, "name": "linux_browser_extensions"}
